dct_description_sm: Decorated with sailing ships, fish and other animals.
Latitudinal and longitudinal lines along margin.
Decorative cartouche, fauna within continent (e.g. elephants), ships, sea monsters, mermaid and merman.
From Jansson's Nieuwen atlas, ofte Werelt-beschrijvinge, Amsterdam, 1657-1687.
